'''15w49b''' is the forty-fifth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on December 3, 2015<ref>{{link|url=https://www.mojang.com/2015/12/minecraft-snapshot-15w49a/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20151206083408/https://www.mojang.com/2015/12/minecraft-snapshot-15w49a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 15w49a|author=Searge|website=Mojang.com|date=Dec 3, 2015}}</ref> to fix some bugs and crashes from [[15w49a]].

== Additions ==
=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|time query}} '''
* Now accepts the value <code>day</code>, which returns the in-game day number.

'''[[Sound]] events'''
* <code>entity.leashknot.break</code>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Cobweb]]s'''
* Removed ability to catch thrown projectiles (added in [[15w49a]]).

'''[[End portal block]]'''
* Hitbox height changed to 0.75 (was 0.0625).

=== Items ===
'''[[Melon Slice|Melon]]s'''
* Melons and glistering melons are once again oriented in opposite directions (they were facing the same direction in [[15w49a]]).

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[Bottles o' enchanting]], [[egg]]s, [[ender pearl]]s, [[snowball]]s, thrown [[potion]]s'''
* Removed ability to be caught by cobwebs (added in [[15w49a]]).
* Again collides with non-opaque blocks.

=== Command format ===
'''[[Sounds]] events'''
* Removed <code>entity.hanging.place</code> and <code>entity.hanging.pop</code>.
